verses.text: \w A|strong="H0776"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* David himself. \w Mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* understand \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* unspotted \w way|strong="H6440"\w*, \w when|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* walked \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* innocence \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* house.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w any|strong="H3588"\w* unjust \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* hated \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* iniquities.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* perverse heart did not cleave \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* malignant, \w that|strong="H0935"\w* turned aside \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*, \w I|strong="H0935"\w* \w would|strong="H8034"\w* not know.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* man \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* private detracted \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbour, \w him|strong="H3068"\w* did \w I|strong="H3588"\w* persecute. \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* proud eye, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* unsatiable heart, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* eat.
My eyes were upon the faithful of the earth, to sit with me: the man that walked in the perfect way, he served me.
He that worketh pride shall not dwell in the midst of my house: he that speaketh unjust things did not prosper before my eyes.
In the morning I put to death all the wicked of the land: that I might cut off all the workers of iniquity from the city of the Lord.
